channel.title: I need some help with coding
channel.description: In my C++ class at school, we have to build a program that can be whatever we want. So I picked a runescape private server. But the thing is, most the tutorials out there are just taking someone else's server, changing some code and calling it your own.but I'm trying to find a tutorial that will show me how to code it by myself with out another person's sever. Pleaseeeeee someone help me:(

item.title: I need some help with coding
item.dc:creator: @Ickaslas Ickaslas
item.description:
@Ickaslas wrote:

Lol that’s true. But I know a lot about C++ but not so much about java coding.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeah, I guess you’re right lol. But like is there like a blank server and client that I would like be able to make it? I used to have them on my computer but it’s be awhile since I’ve done anything with runescape haha:p
